name: Data Science Blog
tagline: A place to post all things data
body:
### Welcome to my new data science blog

After a few fist fights with Tumblr, followed by neglect and subsequent loss of my domain name, I decided it was time I jumped ship and found a better blogging tool. Here goes GitHub Pages and Jekyll!  If you see more posts on my GitHub site than at my previous [Tumblr site!](http://datasciencegirl.tumblr.com/), then you know I am a convert.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
